web_snippets: Gregory Wrightstone. Credentials. M.S. Geology, West Virginia ... Wrightstone is a geologist who spent decades working for the natural gas industry.
Gregory Wrightstone is a geologist (BS Waynesburg College and MS West Virginia Univ.), bestselling author of Inconvenient Facts and A Very Convenient Warming.
Follow Gregory Wrightstone and explore their bibliography from Amazon's Gregory Wrightstone Author Page.
